titleStmt.title: The teares of Sion upon the death of Josiah, distilled in some country sermon notes on Febr. 4. and 11th, 1649. Being the quinquagesima and sexagesima Sundayes for that yeare.
titleStmt.author: Phil-adelpho-Theo-basieus.

notesStmt.note: "To the reader" signed in Greek characters: Phil-adelpho-Theo-basileus.
A funeral sermon on the death of Charles I.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
